changeSet.author: olciandro.magalhaes
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE susservice.paciente ( seq_paciente SERIAL NOT NULL, nome character varying(100), cpf character varying(20), email character varying(100), telefone character varying(100), data_nascimento date, sexo_seq_sexo bigint, seq_medicamento bigint, CONSTRAINT pk_paciente PRIMARY KEY (seq_paciente) );
